definition[0]: the joint that bends in the middle of your leg
example[0]: Lucy had a bandage round her knee.
example[2]: Tim fell to his knees and started to pray.
example[3]: She was on her knees  (=kneeling), weeding the garden.
definition[1]: the part of your clothes that covers your knee
example[4]: His jeans had holes in both knees.
definition[2]: to hit someone with your knee
example[5]: I kneed him in the groin.
